document_data.name: Falconstar Wayshipping
document_data.mainbody: '''Falconstar Wayshipping''' was a [[business]] located in the city of [[Wheloon]] in [[Cormyr]]. It rented out storage space for cargo. It was owned by [[Mhaernos Falconstar]].
document_data.Description & Defenses: Falconstar Wayshipping made up the southernmost reach of the city on the east bank of the [[Wyvernflow]], ''circa'' [[1369 DR]], lying south of the [[Cormyrean Coins Coster]] compound. The business included a warehouse and a wharf, which were lit by ''[[driftglobe]]''s. Two [[zombie]] [[ettin]]s guarded the wharf, guards watched the warehouse. Assisting these guards was some worse creature that twice killed and devoured whole raiding pirate bands.
document_data.Services: The business rented storage space to caravan masters and ship captains transshipping or wayshipping their cargoes between land and river routes.
document_data.History:
Falconstar Wayshipping was in business by [[1358 DR]] and still in business in [[1369 DR]].

Famed traveler [[Volothamp Geddarm]] wrote about the business in ''[[Volo's Guide to Cormyr]]''.
